meanings.def: the quality of being dense; the degree to which something is dense
examples: The population density in this city is very high.
an average density of 2.4 people per hectare

meanings.def: how thick a solid, liquid or gas is, measured by its mass per unit of volume
examples: similar stars of the same mass and density
Vitamin D deficiency causes a loss of bone density.

meanings.def: the amount of space available on a disk for recording data
